archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0739
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As customer, when I am checking on the progress of an order, I want to be able to view various factors for each order including details of the order, so that I can easily understand what the order I am tracking is for.

properties.value: "Various factors" - to be discussed on dedicated workshop Dominik

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
